description_html: LINK’s Daybreak Lounge Chair embodies the alluring modernism of the mid-century, defined by thin flowing teak slats, an airy stainless steel frame and luxurious made-to-order upholstery. The Daybreak Lounge Chair offers the highest comfort with modern materials and style infused with clean lines and a calm aesthetic. The Daybreak Lounge Chair is available in abundance of fresh finish combinations.
